subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Uniforms
Monuments and Memorials (Structures)
lead_paragraph: The intersection of personal and professional factors — along with the right players — made him the right person to lead the Yankees. On Saturday, the team will retire his number.
snippet: The intersection of personal and professional factors — along with the right players — made him the right person to lead the Yankees. On Saturday, the team will retire his number.
